article.headline: UTEP 72, Fresno State 58
article.story: EL PASO, Texas (AP) -- John Tofi scored scored 18 points on 8-of-11 shooting as Texas-El Paso beat Fresno State 72-58 Saturday night. Omar Thomas added 15 points and Chris Craig had 14 for UTEP (12-3, 3-2 WAC). Filiberto Rivera added eight points and eight assists. Terry Pettis led Fresno State (9-6, 5-1) with 18 points, but he was only 4-of-16 from the field. Shantay Legans scored 11 points and Francis Koffi added 10 for the Bulldogs. The Miners started slowly but used two big runs to put the game away. They went on an 11-4 run to take a 30-23 halftime lead, then used a 14-3 run midway through the second half to take a 62-42 lead with 5:54 left. UTEP then hit 67 percent from the field in the second half and 51 percent for the game. Fresno State shot 40 percent for the game.
